entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022
